synopsis.text: Just when aspiring mangaka Chika Suzugamori's dreams of breaking into the industry are about to crumble under a pile of rejected drafts, she embarks on an impromptu journey northward in search of inspiration and self-discovery. Despite her previous success as a rookie manga award winner, Chika struggles to find her creative spark, leading her to explore the world around her with no set destination. As she navigates through life's twists and turns, Chika's travels have the potential to reignite her passion for storytelling and transform her into the accomplished manga artist she aspires to be.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
